mapper.sql: t.id, t.eqp_id, t.office_id, t.step_id, t.step_code, t.active_flag, t.bc_code, t.ip, t.port, t.device_id, t.model_id, t.model_name, t.protocol_name, t.fab, t.line_no, t.location, t.remarks, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.update_by, t.update_date, t.del_flag
mapper.update: update FAB_EQUIPMENT set ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag} where id = #{id}
